name: Leaf Blight
symptoms: Yellow spots on leaves that turn brown, wilting of leaves
treatment: Apply copper oxychloride spray, remove infected leaves, ensure proper spacing
prevention: Crop rotation, resistant varieties, proper drainage

name: Powdery Mildew
symptoms: White powdery coating on leaves, stunted growth
treatment: Spray sulfur or neem oil, improve air circulation
prevention: Avoid overhead watering, proper plant spacing

name: Rust Disease
symptoms: Orange or reddish-brown pustules on leaves
treatment: Apply fungicides containing propiconazole, remove affected parts

name: Root Rot
symptoms: Wilting despite adequate water, dark mushy roots

name: Bacterial Wilt
symptoms: Sudden wilting of leaves, sticky bacterial ooze from cut stems
prevention: Use disease-free seeds, crop rotation with non-host crops

name: Fusarium Wilt
symptoms: Yellowing of lower leaves, vascular discoloration

name: Anthracnose
symptoms: Dark sunken lesions on fruits and leaves
treatment: Apply carbendazim spray, remove infected plant parts

name: Downy Mildew
symptoms: Yellow patches on upper leaf surface, purplish growth underneath
